survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate patient satisfaction with communication from healthcare providers, including clarity, empathy, and responsiveness.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the clarity of information provided by your healthcare provider during your last visit?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.
